title: Interpretation of seeing cats in a dream

preview.html: Today we will give you the interpretation of seeing cats in a dream. Cats are pets that prefer to eat fish and meat, and they are among the innocent animals that people raise in their homes. Seeing cats in a dream carries many different meanings and interpretations. Seeing a white cat is different from a cat escaping in a dream. It is different from chasing a cat in a dream, and it is one of the visions that many people wonder about. Therefore, today we will present to you the interpretation of seeing cats in a dream in this article in the encyclopedia through the following lines. Interpretation of seeing cats in a dream by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing cats in a dream indicates that some people are deceiving the dreamer. If one dreams of calm cats that do not cause chaos This indicates comfort and happiness, but if one sees cats fighting, this is evidence of problems and disputes. The scholar Ibn Sirin explains that seeing cats in a dream indicates the presence of a malicious and cunning person in the dreamer’s life, while seeing a female cat indicates the arrival of abundance and sustenance. Seeing cats in a dream and taking them out of the house means that there are many good people who love the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about cats in a dream by Ibn ShaheenThe scholar Ibn Shaheen indicates that seeing a female cat is a good and praiseworthy dream, while seeing a group of cats indicates that the dreamer has been exposed To be betrayed by a group around him. If a person sees in a dream that a cat attacked him ferociously, this indicates that the dreamer is suffering from many problems and difficulties in his life. But if a person sees in a dream that he is playing with cats in a dream then he is happy, this indicates that The dreamer will meet a loved one whom he has not met for a long time. But if one sees that a cat has bitten him in a dream, this means that the dreamer will face many problems and difficulties in his life. Interpretation of a dream about cats in a dream for a single girl. If a single girl sees cats in her dream, this means that she will She will get a job soon. But if an unmarried girl sees an unmarried male in her dream, this means that she will be associated with a cunning, deceitful, and untrustworthy man. If a single girl sees a group of cats in her dream, this means that she will suffer from many problems in her life. But if she sees If an unmarried girl sees a lot of cats in her house, this is evidence of the arrival of abundant food and kindness. Interpretation of a dream about cats in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees Her dream is that she is feeding cats, this means that this woman’s house is full of kindness and food, and she will receive more livelihood in the near future. However, if a married woman sees in her dream a group of cats quarreling with each other, this indicates that this woman will face many problems and difficulties in life. Her life. If a woman sees cats in her dream, this means that this woman’s marital life is unstable. If a woman sees a group of cats chasing her, this indicates that there are many cunning people around her.

title: Buying cakes in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: But today, through gptafser.com/, we explain the meanings and interpretation that the portal carries to the world of dreams. Interpretation of seeing a French baguette in a dream for one girl: When a single girl sees herself buying a cake and sharing it in a dream. This indicates that she will hear the good news that will rejoice her heart. And if she sees the Virgin preparing the cake in... The dream is good news that the engagement is approaching, God willing. But if you see in a dream that she is eating cake, this indicates the stability of her emotional life, and God knows best. And seeing him eating the gate with a delicious taste and eating with enthusiasm. This dream symbolizes that her future husband will be characterized by good morals and a good reputation. If he eats the gate Rotten in a dream is not worthy of praise, which indicates that you will have problems coming. And God knows best. Perhaps seeing a girl preparing sweets in a dream is a sign that she will be associated with receiving people who care about money. But the love between them and money will disappear if marriage occurs, and God knows best. Preparing a cake in a dream, it could be a short wedding or the fulfillment of the girl’s dreams and desires, God knows best. The greatest and most knowledgeable. Buying a baguette in a virgin girl’s dream can mean a variety of signs, including commitment and success in the field of work or in the field of study, and God knows best. And if she cuts the cake in a dream, this is good news for her, because she carries big money. Which you will get. See also: Interpretation of a divorced woman’s dream of eating. Interpretation of seeing a married woman buying a cake in a dream. Seeing a married woman in a dream preparing a cake inside her home means that she is a woman who does not do anything that conflicts with the religion of God. As for seeing a married woman, it is a sign of her pregnancy, God willing. And when You see a married woman preparing the ingredients for a cake. This dream indicates that God will bring her sustenance and goodness, God willing. Preparing a cake in a dream is a sign that this woman’s life will witness good changes. If a woman dreams that she is decorating a cake, this symbolizes the end of worries and that she will find peace. In her life, God willing. Interpretation of the vision of buying a French baguette in a dream for a man and its meaning. When a man sees a vision of a cake in a dream, this means that he is going through a period full of fatigue and anxiety, and God knows best. Also, seeing a man’s baguette in his dream is a sign of his discomfort in the matters of his life, and God knows best. Gatorade in a man's dream reflects his feelings in reality and the tension surrounding him. Seeing chocolate cake in a dream is a sign of the desires and aspirations that will come true for this man. His worries will go away, thanks to God. Eating cake in a dream is a symbol of failure in management in the field of work. And God knows best. When a man sees a rotten cake in a dream, this dream is a sign of the man’s feeling of discomfort and distress in life. And if he sees himself unable to eat the gate after trying, it may be punishments that prevent him from achieving what he wants and aspires to. Read Also: Interpretation of seeing Gatorade in a dream in detail. The meaning of seeing buying baguette bread in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Seeing a pregnant woman eating a lot of cake in a dream is evidence that what she hopes for and dreams will come true.

title: What is the most accurate interpretation of seeing a dead person taking me with him to Ibn Shirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the dead take me with him: Dreaming of the dead is not a scary dream, as seeing them brings many important signs in the dream that must be followed carefully, but taking the dead in the neighborhood makes him feel very afraid, as he believes that his death is approaching. You will become familiar with the interpretation of seeing a dead person with someone in detail to know what it indicates. The interpretation of seeing a dead person takes me with him. When the dreamer sees him talking to this dead person and eating with him and then getting up to pick him up, this confirms that this person will be freed from crises in his life and that he will know the path to happiness through great expansion. In his livelihood and money. And if this deceased person never wants to give it up and wants to take it even if the dreamer refuses, this confirms that he will suffer from physical fatigue, but it will not last long and he will recover in a short time. The dream may indicate that this dreamer may suffer from some damage If the dead person takes him and speaks obedience and prayer, this is evidence that the dreamer is honored by God Almighty in this world and the hereafter by his good deeds. The dream is a warning of the necessity of abandoning any shameful work and possessing good qualities that please God Almighty. Seeing him traveling with him is evidence that there are matters that confuse the viewer in his life and he cannot make a useful decision about them, and if she goes with him to a place and sits there for a while and then leaves him, this indicates that she survived a crisis that almost killed him. The interpretation of seeing a dead person takes me with him to Ibn Shirin. If The dreamer saw this dream, but woke up before he could complete it. This is a warning from God about the need to stay away from the sins he commits in his life. The vision is a sign of hatred and anxiety when the dreamer goes with him to a place he does not know and has never seen before. Perhaps the vision is an expression of his need. To alms to bring him out of his bad state and the afterlife for the better. Not wanting to go is evidence of the dreamer’s superiority in his life’s affairs and overcoming any problem he faces during this time. The vision can only be a sign of confirmation, especially if the deceased was one of his relatives. Interpretation of seeing the dead person taking me with him To Ibn Shirin, the interpretation of seeing the deceased taking me with him to celibacy. Single people may be afraid when they see this dream, but we find that the vision varies and has more than one meaning, so the vision indicates: If the deceased came to her and was happy and wanted to take her with him, but he did not respond to this request, then this portends happiness in The coming period, and it will be better than before because of the positive changes that will happen to it. For her later. But if she tries to get it and succeeds, the dream is not an evil sign but rather a test from God (Glory be to Him) to know how steadfast and patient she is in life and she will come out. From that easily. Her agreement in the dream to go with the dead does not explain any harm to her, but rather indicates that she will go through some difficulties that she will easily escape as a result of her good deeds. The dead girl’s gift indicates that her life is going on a healthy path and that she is completely stable, whether at work. Or in the study. The interpretation of seeing the deceased takes me with him to the married woman. Her vision of a man is considered Mi

title: Interpretation of a dream about my brother-in-law in my bedroom

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my brother-in-law in my bedroom in a dream: We may find that some people want to know the interpretation of a dream about my brother-in-law in my bedroom in a dream, and we find that among the dreams that some people want to know the interpretation of so that they know that those in charge of the site do not provide interpretations, but they are from the heart the interpretations of some scholars.Interpretation Dreaming of my brother-in-law in my bedroom in a dream: If a woman sees that her husband’s brother was in her bedroom, this may mean that he knows many family and marital secrets, and God knows best. It is possible that this vision indicates the changes that occurred between them in those days and they must ask for God’s help. This vision could refer to his opponents who were among them at that time, and God knows best. If a woman sees that her husband’s brother was in her bedroom, this may indicate the emergence of some problems and disagreements between them in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams about my husband’s brother-in-law is bothering me In a dream, if a woman sees that her husband’s brother is mistreating her in a dream, this may indicate the evil that she will face during that period, and God knows best. This dream may also indicate that there is a problem between brother and brother and that they need to seek help from God. This vision also shows bad changes that may Talk between them at this time, and God knows best. If a woman sees that her husband’s brother was mistreating her, this may indicate that the dreamer is far from God, Blessed and Most High, and needs to get closer to God Almighty. Interpretation of dreams of my husband’s brother combing my hair in a dream: seeing The husband’s brother combing a woman’s hair in a dream may indicate recovery from the diseases he suffers from through the grace of God. This vision may indicate the fulfillment of desires and the achievement of goals by the grace of God. If a woman sees that she is taking her husband, and he was combing her hair in a dream, this may indicate Many good things will come to the woman at that time, and God knows best. This vision may indicate happiness and happy events that will come to them in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams of my husband’s brother-in-law hitting me in a dream. Hitting my husband’s brother in a dream may indicate great benefit that may befall them in those days. Seeing the husband’s brother hitting a woman in a dream may indicate a dispute between the two brothers, and they must seek help from God. Also, this dream may indicate a great benefit that may accrue to her husband’s brother at that time, and God knows best. If a woman sees her husband’s brother being beaten, This may indicate poor relations between them at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams of my husband’s brother defending me in a dream Seeing my husband’s brother defending the woman in a dream may mean that he was standing by his brother permanently at that time. Also, this vision It could indicate good events occurring in their lives during those days, thanks to God. This vision may indicate many good things that will come to them at this time, and God knows best. This dream may indicate the seriousness of the husband’s fall and that his brother will stand by his side, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about wearing a gold bracelet on the left hand of a pregnant woman

preview.html: Today, from your website gptafser.com/, we are talking about the interpretation of wearing a gold bracelet in a dream for women and men in detail. The interpretation of seeing an unmarried girl wearing a gold bracelet on her left hand in a dream. Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing a gold bracelet in a dream is a dream worthy of praise. Because it indicates Kindness and abundance of money in a short time for the dreamer, and God knows best. As for seeing an unmarried girl in a dream wearing an iron bracelet on her left hand. A sign that the dreamer will get rid of all her problems and get rid of the pressures of life, and God knows best. Dreaming of wearing gold bracelets on the left hand in a dream For an unmarried girl in a dream. The dream of a woman marrying a very rich man, and God knows best. To see a gold bracelet in a dream for an unmarried girl, symbolizes achieving goals and realizing her ambitions after a great effort on her part, and God knows best. Seeing herself wearing gold bracelets in a dream for a girl Unmarried in a dream, the dream is a metaphor for her purity and chastity, and the purity of her heart, and God knows best. An unmarried girl sees herself in a dream wearing a golden bracelet and she is happy about that. It is a good sign that she will marry a well-mannered young man, and he will love and love her very much, and God knows best. Whether I saw a single girl wearing gold bracelets of different colors in a dream. It is a metaphor for the dreamer’s bright future, and God knows best. As for seeing a gold bracelet bought in a dream at a high price in an unmarried girl’s dream. It is a metaphor for a woman entering a new phase in her life entitled happiness and joy, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a gift of a gold ring in a dream. Interpretation of seeing wearing a gold bracelet on the left hand in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a gold bracelet in a dream for a married woman symbolizes the changes that occur in the dreamer, and they are mostly praiseworthy, and God knows best. When a married woman dreams of wearing a gold bracelet on her left hand In a dream. Good skin for her well-being and sense of family stability. The vision may indicate that the woman is pregnant, which makes her very happy, and God knows best. Seeing a gold bracelet in a dream for a married woman is a metaphor for pregnancy for the woman, and God knows best. Seeing many gold bracelets in a dream for a married woman is a vision worthy of praise. It indicates that her husband will receive a large inheritance from her. Perhaps it is an indication of hearing good news about them and the goodness of their children, and God knows best. Seeing golden bracelets in a married woman’s dream means good offspring. The appearance of a shiny golden bracelet in a dream for a married woman indicates that her daughter will marry a young man from Family. Seeing a married woman taking off her gold bracelet in a dream means that she may divorce her husband because of many problems, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a gold bracelet on his left hand for a man and its meaning. When a man dreams that he is making gold bracelets in a dream in his own workshop. The dream indicates that there will be many good things. You will come to him very soon, and God knows best. A man who sees himself buying golden bracelets and offering them to a girl he does not know in a dream is a sign that he will get married soon. The dream indicates that there will be many good things. You will come to him very soon, and God knows best. A man who sees himself buying golden bracelets and offering them to a girl he does not know in a dream is a sign that he will get married soon. Seeing golden bracelets in a dream in a man’s house symbolizes the appearance of...

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about a house of fire from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a fire in the house in a dream: Seeing a fire is considered one of the visions that causes panic for its owner. This vision carries many connotations that vary based on many considerations, including that the fire may not cause harm and may explode in the house and destroy it, and may lead to its destruction. To be in the house of relatives or neighbors, and what concerns us in this article is to examine all the indicators and cases of a dream about a fire in the house. Learn about the interpretation of a dream about a house of fire from Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams about a house fire. The vision of fire expresses torment, hell, committing sins, disobedience, and punishments imposed on the corrupt and unjust, It also expresses power, control, abundance of knowledge, and a return to the right path. Seeing a house burning in a dream is a sign of distress, anxiety, many sorrows, exposure to severe distress, and the occurrence of a disaster whose elimination will be a miracle. From the interpretation of a dream about a house fire, this vision indicates serious changes that negatively affect It affects the person, preventing him from achieving his goal and desire, and preventing him from living in peace, as he may go through a difficult and dry period. And he will waste all his efforts. If someone says: I dreamed of a fire in our house, this vision indicates the conflicts and strife that take place in the environment in which the dreamer lives, and he enters a dark stage in which he cannot achieve any of the declared goals. Burning houses is evidence of calamity, calamity, widespread corruption, and punishments that he cannot escape. There are many sins that will be punished sooner or later if one does not repent for them. Interpretation of a dream about a house of fire by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing fire is a warning or warning of a painful event, sad news, or disaster that will cause the dreamer to lose his normal life and spoil his expectations and plans. If he sees fire in his house, This indicates the presence of a cunning enemy who seeks to harm him in every possible way, and an eye lurking in his movements and stability and who wants to harm him without regard to those he lives with. The fire in the house may be caused by Satan or the jinn, and this serves as a warning to the individual of the need to be careful, avoid signs of doubt, get close to God, perform obligatory duties without neglect or negligence, and give charity. For the poor and very prayerful. If a fire broke out in his house and caused damage to his body or clothes, this may be an indication of a serious illness or a major loss and reversal of the condition, the end of a certain period of his life and the beginning of a new era. But if he sees the house burning, and he is in it, and no harm is done to it, then this indicates secrets and manifestations, and the divine gift and benefit that he obtains from a man worthy of his stature and will. People. If he sees a fire burning in it without leaving traces of burning, then this indicates the debts paid to him, the wills made by others, the achievement of goals and objectives, and the collapse of adversities and crises. On the other hand, a fire in the house expresses the work of magicians, charlatans, and secret hatred. Which drives some to harm others to achieve their vile purposes. Interpretation of a dream about a house fire for single women: Seeing a fire in the house in a dream symbolizes discomfort, stability, and a constant feeling of anxiety that brings

title: Interpretation of a dream about someone who missed an exam in a dream and its effects

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of someone who missed an exam Exam season is a very difficult time for students because it is a time full of stress and tension. Some students dream that they did not pass the exam or missed the exam, and this dream is also common among non-students, and in the article we will explain the interpretation of a dream that they failed the exam. Interpretation of a dream about being late for exams: An unmarried woman has many dreams that make her want to know their meaning and the interpretations that refer to them, and among these dreams are The dream of being late for exams preoccupied many girls, as we will show you in this paragraph the interpretation of the dream in detail: Being late for an exam in a dream means that her marriage will be delayed. It also means delaying some important events that await single people. If this dream was during exams for unmarried women in reality This is a sign for her to try hard. Failing exams in a dream means that she will achieve her desired goals. Being late for exams in a dream means that there are some things that a single woman should be aware of. Seeing a single woman late for exams in a dream may reflect Her chaotic life in reality. It means the need for single people to rearrange their interests and priorities. To dream of an unmarried woman cheating in exams means that some of the things she desires will not be completed. Passing exams in a dream means her wedding date is approaching, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about cutting Nails in a dream and its consequences. Interpretation of a dream about an exam and the lack of a solution. If the dreamer saw in his dream that he was going to take an exam but could not solve the questions and was trying hard to remember the information and solve the questions, then this carries multiple evidence, as scholars interpreted the dream with the exam and the lack of it. A solution based on the following points: Heading for an examination and not being able to solve it means that the dreamer faces major problems in his life. This dream may indicate the presence of some problems in the context of work. Also, what the dream of examination and the lack of a solution indicates is the presence of an enemy for the dreamer, who is in the form of a lover. Deceive him, and this is a warning to the dreamer about the people around him. If one sees in a dream that he is taking an exam and cannot solve it, this means that the dreamer is facing a big problem, but he will not be able to solve it. A dream in which he is trying but cannot solve it means that the dreamer does not appreciate the important things in his life. Not being able to solve exams in a dream It is one of the dreams that indicate the dreamer’s need to be careful about the affairs of his life. See also: Interpretation of dreams to see the witness in the dream and its interpretation A vision for someone who missed the exam about Al-Nabulsi and its effects. Al-Nabulsi explained the dreamer’s vision of failing the exam and losing the exam for him, with many interpretations, some of which are useful to the dreamer, and some of which are useful to the dreamer. It is interpreted with bad interpretations. If the dreamer is able to answer the test questions, it means that he is close to God. Passing the test in the dream explains that the dreamer is able to overcome the difficulties he faces. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is entering the examination hall, but he cannot answer On all questions, it means A

title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing a date in a dream for a single woman from Ibn Sirin and the interpretation of the dream of buying a date for a single woman

preview.html: Seeing a date in a dream for a single woman is one of the visions that comforts the soul and portends many good things, as dates are actually one of the blessed fruits and give the eater energy and activity to help him in hard work. But if an unmarried woman sees herself eating dates or eating spoiled dates, there are other completely different interpretations, which we will learn about later. Seeing a date in a dream for a single woman Dates in a dream for an unmarried woman have many praiseworthy meanings related to future events that the girl will attend or describing her personality And its characteristics that distinguish it among people. An occasion related to the dreamer in which her entire family gathers happy and congratulated, perhaps success in an important field or marriage to the boy of her dreams. As for whoever sees someone offering her a luxurious dish with many dates in different shapes and colors, she will enjoy abundant goodness that exceeds all her expectations, as the coming days will bring her blessings. And unlimited blessings, and compensate her for everything she was. She went through and suffered in the previous period and for her patience in the harsh circumstances that befell her. Perhaps this dream is an interpretation of an important position in the position that the dreamer will reach, and he will have great importance in her society and a great influence in history. Seeing a date in the individual dream of Ibn Sirin, according to the opinion of the venerable Sheikh Ibn Sirin. Sirin, dates in a dream are good visions that portend a lot of goodness and prosperity. There is a young man with great wealth and great attraction who will propose to her and she will be happy with him in a future full of luxury and prosperity. Seeing eating dates in a dream for an unmarried woman. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is eating a lot of wet dates, this is an indication that she will soon receive a large sum of money. Money without effort or striving to obtain it, perhaps from an inheritance left to her by a rich person. As for a woman who sees that she is eating on a date with one of her relatives or with her lover, this indicates that this person has a strong relationship with him that is dominated by understanding and honesty. Eating on a date in a dream expresses the goodness of work and the danger of religiosity, as the dreamer seeks to achieve lawful gains, even if he A little, but he seeks the blessing of wealth, not abundance. Seeing yourself dating single women in a dream expresses that the dreamer will enjoy goodness and blessings in the future steps of her life (God willing) and will enjoy a prominent position among people, especially those around her, because she is a kind-hearted girl who loves kindness to everyone. without. Differences, and this science also shows that the viewer reaches science and culture have a great status and seeks to spread his knowledge to everyone to achieve great benefit for society and develop their awareness towards the world. While some believe that this dream indicates that the girl will be a source of livelihood for many, and provide them with a job with an ample income that guarantees them Living decently, you may implement a large commercial project in which a large percentage of the needy will participate. Interpretation of dreams about buying a date for single women. According to the opinions of the imams of interpretation, an unmarried woman who

title: Interpretation of seeing someone writing in a dream

preview.html: Seeing someone writing in beautiful handwriting in a dream: If a person sees himself writing in beautiful handwriting in a dream, this is a sign of the integrity of the dreamer and good character. It is a sign that he is doing very good deeds in seeking the satisfaction of God Almighty. But if a person sees himself writing in bad handwriting in a dream, then this A sign of his bad intentions and many sins. Interpretation of writing on the blackboard in a dream: Seeing writing in a dream means deception and fraud to which the dreamer will be exposed. In Ibn Sirin’s interpretation: Seeing writing in a dream symbolizes inheritance on the path to insight. And if a person sees himself in a dream writing things Vaguely on a piece of paper or stationery. This is evidence of his abandonment of the obligation of prayer and the need to re-examine himself and commit to performing his duties in full. Interpretation of seeing writing with a pen in a dream Seeing a pen in a dream symbolizes the eloquence and extensive knowledge that the person having the vision possesses. If the person sees himself writing with a pen in a dream In a dream, this is a sign of his wisdom and the strength of his thinking. And if a person sees himself writing some advice using a pen in the dream, this is an indication that the dreamer is doing what he advises and is not hypocritical or deceiving anyone. Seeing someone writing my name in a dream If a person sees himself in a dream, he is writing his name on a blank sheet of paper. This An indication that there is a good job opportunity in front of the visionary person. Whereas if one sees in his dream that he is writing his name on a damaged or dirty piece of paper. This is an indication that the visionary person will suffer a loss in his life, either sooner or later. And if one sees in the dream that he is writing His name is in a place full of signs of sadness and unhappiness. This is a sign that the visionary has gone through a painful incident that saddens him for a period of his life. But if one sees in a dream that he is writing his name in a place full of green plants, this is a sign of many good and happy news that will change the dreamer’s life. For the better. And if a person sees in a dream, he is writing the name Muhammad. This is good news for the person who sees a big change in his life in a positive way. And well, because the name Muhammad is one of the names that indicate goodness and many blessings. If someone sees in a dream that he is writing his desires and life goals on A piece of paper and then he signed his name on it, this is an indication that these desires are being fulfilled in reality. Interpretation of a dream about writing in a notebook: Seeing writing in a notebook is an unpleasant vision in most cases, but there are some good interpretations of this vision as well. If one sees himself writing in A dirty and unclean paper notebook, then this is a sign that there are some problems and crises that will pass in the life of the visionary. And if someone sees that he is writing symbols in the notebook, this is a sign that the visionary is exposed to a very big problem that will disturb and bother him for a long time. But seeing that he His writing on paper is an indication that he can solve this problem and overcome it in reality. But if one sees in a dream he is writing in a notebook that is pure white and pure. This is a sign of piety, faith and commitment to the teachings of religion that the owner has

If one sees himself writing in A dirty and unclean paper notebook, then this is a sign that there are some problems and crises that will pass in the life of the visionary. And if someone sees that he is writing symbols in the notebook, this is a sign that the visionary is exposed to a very big problem that will disturb and bother him for a long time. But seeing that he His writing on paper is an indication that he can solve this problem and overcome it in reality. But if one sees in a dream he is writing in a notebook that is pure white and pure. This is a sign of piety, faith and commitment to the teachings of religion that the owner has
